thread.title: 3 Little-Known Facts About the TV Show 'Cheers'
thread.title_full: 3 Little-Known Facts About the TV Show 'Cheers'

author: Bradley Hasemeyer
title: 3 Little-Known Facts About the TV Show 'Cheers'
text:
' The Walking Dead' Season 5 Recap: 'Cheers' Theme 
(SPOILER ALERT) 
A video is taking over the web that recaps Season Five of 'Walking Dead' in the best way possible: as a 'Cheers' spoof! The List 's Bradley Hasemeyer with 3 little-known facts about the show that set the bar for sitcoms... now on The List ! 3 Little-Known Facts About the TV Show 'Cheers' 

3. 'Cheers' was almost canceled after one season. 
2. Ted Danson wore a hairpiece throughout the show's run. 
1. The part of 'Frasier' was written for John Lithgow. Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
